response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value to us and, based on its quality and uniqueness, it is also worth $1,200,000 to you. We understand the importance of such a significant investment and thus aim to make this transaction as beneficial as possible for both parties.

We are offering you the chance to purchase this product at a special introductory price of $1,100,000. This represents a savings of $100,000 compared to its full value, providing you with an excellent return on your investment. Our goal is to ensure that you not only receive a high-quality product but also experience the best value for your money.

Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer. We are confident that you will find this product to be an invaluable asset. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out to us.

Thank you for considering our offer. We look forward to the possibility of working together.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1100000}
